mapper.select: select p.pid, p.pname, p.pnote, p.pstatus, b.bno, b.bname, pc.pcid, pc.pcimg1, pc.pcimg2, pc.pcimg3, pc.pcchipimg, pc.pccolorcode, pc.pcprice, ps.psid, ps.psstock, ps.psize from product_common p inner join brand b on (b.bno = p.bno) left join product_color pc on (p.pid = pc.pid) left join product_stock ps on (ps.pcid = pc.pcid) where p.pid = #{pId}

SELECT pcom.pid, pcolor.pcid, pcom.pname, pcom.bname, pcom.pstatus, pcom.bno, pcolor.pcprice, pcolor.pccolorcode, pcolor.pcimg1, pcolor.pcchipimg, pstock.psstock from product_common pcom INNER JOIN product_category pcat ON pcom.pid = pcat.pid INNER JOIN category c ON c.cateno = pcat.cateno INNER JOIN product_color pcolor ON pcolor.pid = pcom.pid INNER JOIN product_stock pstock ON pstock.pcid = pcolor.pcid WHERE pcom.pname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR pcom.bname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR pcom.pid LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR pcolor.pcid LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR pstock.psid LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' group by pcom.pid, pcolor.pcid, pcom.pname, pcom.bname, pcom.pstatus, pcom.bno, pcolor.pcprice, pcolor.pccolorcode, pcolor.pcimg1, pcolor.pcchipimg, pstock.psstock

select pcolor.pcid, pcom.bname, pcom.pname , pcolor.pcimg1, pcolor.pcimg2, pcolor.pcimg3, pcom.pnote, pstock.psid, pcolor.pcprice, pstock.psize, pstock.psstock from product_color pcolor inner join product_common pcom on pcolor.pid = pcom.pid inner join product_stock pstock on pstock.pcid = pcolor.pcid where pcolor.pid = #{pid} and pcolor.pcid =#{pcid}

SELECT sub.pcid, sub.withpcid, sub.pcimg1, sub.pcprice, sub.pname, sub.bname, sub.pid, pcolor.pcchipimg, pcolor.pccolorcode, pcolor.pcid as otherpcid, pcolor.pcimg1 as otherpcimg1 FROM( SELECT wp.pcid, wp.withpcid, pcolor.pcimg1, pcolor.pcprice, pcom.pname, brand.bname, pcolor.pid FROM with_product wp INNER JOIN product_color pcolor ON pcolor.pcid = wp.withpcid and wp.pcid = #{pcid} INNER JOIN product_common pcom ON pcom.pid = pcolor.pid INNER JOIN brand ON brand.bno = pcom.bno ) sub INNER JOIN product_color pcolor ON pcolor.pid = sub.pid
select cn.firstname, cn.secondname, cn.detailname, c.depth1name, c.depth2name, c.depth3name from category_name cn inner join category c on c.cateno = cn.cateno
SELECT secondname, depth2name FROM category_name cn INNER JOIN category c ON cn.cateno = c.cateno WHERE c.depth1name = #{keyword} GROUP BY secondname, depth2name ORDER BY secondname
SELECT detailname, depth3name FROM category_name cn inner join category c on cn.cateno = c.cateno where c.depth2name = #{keyword} group by detailname, depth3name order by detailname
select count(*) from likes where mid = #{mId} and pid = #{pId}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where mid = #{mId} and pid = #{pId}
mapper.insert: insert into likes (pid, mid, ltime) values (#{pId}, #{mId}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'))
mapper.select: select count(*) from likes where mid = #{mId}
SELECT PSIZE FROM PRODUCT_STOCK WHERE PSSTOCK != 0 AND PCID = #{pcId} ORDER BY PSIZE
SELECT pc.PCID, pc.PCCHIPIMG, pc.PCCOLORCODE, pci.COLORNAME FROM PRODUCT_COLOR pc, PRODUCT_COLOR_INFO pci WHERE pc.PCID = pci.PCID AND PID = #{pId} ORDER BY pc.PCID DESC
SELECT PSSTOCK FROM PRODUCT_STOCK WHERE PSID = #{psId}

SELECT ps.PSID, b.BNAME, pc1.PNAME, pci.COLORNAME, pc2.PCPRICE, ps.PSIZE, pci.PIMG FROM PRODUCT_STOCK ps, PRODUCT_COMMON pc1, PRODUCT_COLOR pc2, PRODUCT_COLOR_INFO pci, BRAND b WHERE ps.PCID = pc2.PCID AND pc1.PID = pc2.PID AND pc1.BNO = b.BNO AND pc2.PCID = pci.PCID AND ps.PSID = #{psId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_STOCK SET PSSTOCK = PSSTOCK - #{subQty} WHERE PSID = #{psId}
